name: Super Cat Tales Rotation Tower
description:
Super Cat Tales Rotation Tower is a game where you navigate Alex through a player-controlled rotation, the game features 15 levels of varying difficulty, your goal is to reach the bell at the end of each level.

The game has 2 modes

  • Normal Mode, get to the end of the game
  • Speedrun Mode, a timed mode where you reach the end of the game as fast as you can!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Super Cat Tales and any related property are owned by Neutronized.
